text:
Looks like California government has launched digital democracy project.
This platform "Engaged California" might be something similar to what we do in "Idobata"
<https://calmatters.digitaldemocracy.org/about-digital-democracy>
<https://engaged.ca.gov/>

attachments.fallback: Digital Democracy | CalMatters: About Digital Democracy - Digital Democracy | CalMatters
attachments.text: Digital Democracy is a CalMatters project using technology and data to increase transparency, accountability and understanding about California state legislators and the decisions they make about state policy.
attachments.title: About Digital Democracy - Digital Democracy | CalMatters

attachments.text: Engaged California is an online platform that makes it easier for Californians to have a voice in government.
attachments.title: Engaged California
